collectionusage: This collection aims to assist users in understanding, analyzing, and interpreting data to make informed business decisions.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with various data analysis tasks in a business context, such as interpreting key performance indicators, analyzing financial data, and evaluating market trends.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to help you understand and analyze data in a business setting.

usermessages.title: KPI Analysis
usermessages.usage: For users who want to understand the significance of key performance indicators in their business.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) in a business. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are KPIs and how can I analyze them to improve my business?

usermessages.title: Financial Data Interpretation
usermessages.usage: For users who need to understand and interpret financial data.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to interpret common financial statements in a business. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I read and interpret an income statement?

usermessages.title: Market Research Analysis
usermessages.usage: For users who want to understand how to conduct and analyze market research.
usermessages.directive: Describe the process for conducting market research and how to analyze the results. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I'm planning to launch a new product. How should I conduct market research and analyze the data?

usermessages.title: Customer Behavior Analysis
usermessages.usage: For users interested in understanding customer behavior through data analysis.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to analyze customer behavior data to improve business strategies. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I use customer data to improve my marketing strategies?

usermessages.title: Sales Forecasting
usermessages.usage: For users who need to forecast sales based on historical data.
usermessages.directive: Describe methods for forecasting sales using historical data. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: We have past sales data for the last two years. How can we forecast sales for the next quarter?
